Lyric:
[by:前方直走有妖气]
[00:04]There's a fire starting in my heart
[00:09]Reaching a fever pitch, and it's bringing me out the dark
[00:14]Finally, I can see you crystal clear
[00:19]Go ahead and sell me out, and I'll lay your shit bare
[00:22]See how I'll leave with every piece of you
[00:27]Don't underestimate the things that I will do
[00:32]There's a fire starting in my heart
[00:36]Reaching a fever pitch and it's bringing me out the dark
[00:42]The scars of your love remind me of us
[00:46]They keep me thinking that we almost had it all
[00:51]The scars of your love, they leave me breathless
[00:55]I can't help feeling...
[00:58]We could have had it all
[01:02]Rolling in the deep
[01:07]You had my heart inside of your hands
[01:12]And you played it to the beat
[01:17]Baby, I have no story to be told
[01:22]But I've heard one on you, now I'm gonna make your head burn
[01:26]Think of me in the depths of your despair
[01:31]Make a home down there as mine sure won't be shared
[01:36]The scars of your love remind me of us
[01:41]They keep me thinking that we almost had it all
[01:46]The scars of your love, they leave me breathless
[01:51]I can't help feeling...
[01:53]We could have had it all
[01:57]Rolling in the deep
[02:01]You had my heart inside of your hand
[02:07]And you played it to the beat
[02:11]We could have had it all
[02:15]Rolling in the deep
[02:20]You had my heart inside of your hand
[02:26]And you played it with a beating
[02:30]Throw your soul through every open door
[02:35]Count your blessings to find what you look for
[02:40]Turn my sorrow into treasured gold
[02:44]You'll pay me back in kind and reap just what you sow
[02:51]We could have had it all
[02:56]We could have had it all
[03:02]It all, it all, it all...
[03:05]We could have had it all
[03:10]Rolling in the deep
[03:15]You had my heart inside of your hand
[03:20]And you played it to the beat
[03:23]We could have had it all
[03:28]Rolling in the deep
[03:33]You had my heart inside of your hand
[03:38]But you played it, you played it, you played it
[03:42]You played it to the beat
